name: Rewind (itch) (Becca Miller, bry-ande)
description:
Manipulate time as you search through home videos from your past. Made in 48 hours for  GMTK 2021.

Controls
WASD / Arrow keys to move
Space to jump
Q to rewind time
E to move time forward
C to interact

Credits
Design and Writing by Bryget Anderson and Becca Miller
Art by Bryget Anderson
Programming by Becca Miller

Audio adapted from the following sources under the Creative Commons Attribution License:
Radio Static 1 by Sokol_Soundworks
VHS Player Rewind by cribbler
Stop Start Tape.Player by constructabeat
